data.quote: Not everyone can become a great artist, but a great artist can come from anywhere.
data.author: Anton Ego,  Ratatouille

data.quote: There is no greater gift than friendship.
data.author: Santa Clause, The Polar Express

data.quote: Your identity is your most valuable possession. Protect it.
data.author: Elastigirl, The Incredibles

data.quote: There is a whole lot more to racing than just winning.
data.author: Tex, Cars

data.quote: As long as we are together; it doesn't matter to me.
data.author: Marty, Madagascar

data.quote: To laugh at yourself, is to love yourselft.
data.author: Mickey Mouse

data.quote: Storms pass. Just wait until you reach the shore and never stop dreaming.
data.author: Repunzel, Disney's Tangled

data.quote: All it takes is a little faith and trust.
data.author: Peter Pan

data.quote: Do not be fooled by commonplace appearance. Like so many things, it is not what outside, but what is inside that counts..
data.author: Alladin, Disney's Alladin

data.quote: Your mind is like water. When it is agitated it becomes difficult to see, but when you let it settle; the answer becomes clear.
data.author: Oogway, Kung Fu Panda

data.quote: I’m only brave enough when I have to be. Being brave doesn’t mean you go looking for trouble.
data.author: Mufasa, The Lion King

data.quote: There is no secret ingredient. It's just you.
data.author: Po, Kung Fu Panda

data.quote: It's not the beard on the outside that counts, its the beard on the INSIDE.
data.author: Action Hank, Dexter's Laboratory

data.quote: The flower that blooms in adversity is the more rare and beautiful of all.
data.author: The Emporor of China, Mulan

data.quote: Just because I cannot see it, doesn't mean I can't believe it.
data.author: Jack Skellington, The Nightmare Before Christmas

data.quote: The things that make me different are the things that make me.
data.author: Pooh, Winnie The Pooh

data.quote: Anything is possible when you have inner peace.
data.author: Master Shifu, Kung Fu Panda
